name: Micro City Parking
description:
Micro City Parking

The ultimate parking game

The game starts of easy, simply park your car, the as the levels progress the games gets harder and harder, sometimes your parking space in at the other side of town so you have to rush before your time runs out, sometimes you may have a trailer to park first.

Lots of challenging levels and even more levels coming soon.

Produced by www.AppStyle.co.uk

Voiced by www.VoiceoverGuy.co.uk

For updates and info on more of our apps follow us on twitter

http://www.twitter.com/appstyleuk
